Abiward or Abi-ward, was an ancient Sasanian city in modern-day Turkmenistan. Archaeological excavations at the ancient city of Abiward have been made in the 20th century about 8 km west of Kaka () in an area of 12,000 m2. The central tell is 60 feet high and 700 feet round.
